name: Please get out of my House!
name_original: Please get out of my House!
description:
Play as Ghosty and scare out your unwanted guests!

Lure guests into different rooms using lights or moving objects, and scare them out by moving objects, splashing water or setting fires! Each guest is attracted to and afraid of something different, so thing strategically to scare the most people out at a time!

E - Interact

WASD - Move

Mouse - Camera

Scare as many people as you can before the timer runs out while trying not to waste your Spirit Energy!

Originally created for the "Waste not, Want not" Jam, and a super early Halloween game by 363 days! Just to get you into the Halloween spirit early!
